Pre-Game Insights: In the build-up to Germany’s last-16 match against Denmark, The Athletic sat down with Gundogan at Germany’s training base in Herzogenaurach.
After securing top spot in Group A, confidence was high.
Gundogan praised the resilience shown by Germany in their last game against Switzerland, where they came back to draw 1-1 in stoppage time.
Gundogan highlighted the standout performances of Florian Wirtz and Jamal Musiala, and the returning Toni Kroos.
Gundogan mentioned the positive impact of the coaching staff and the smart decisions made since Julian Nagelsmann took over as manager in September 2023.
